member.name: D3D11_AUTHENTICATED_QUERY_RESTRICTED_SHARED_RESOURCE_PROCESS_OUTPUT
member.summary: Contains the response to a D3D11_AUTHENTICATED_QUERY_RESTRICTED_SHARED_RESOURCE_PROCESS query.

member.name: D3D11_AUTHENTICATED_QUERY_RESTRICTED_SHARED_RESOURCE_PROCESS_OUTPUT.Output
member.summary: A structure that contains a Message Authentication Code (MAC) and other data.

member.name: D3D11_AUTHENTICATED_QUERY_RESTRICTED_SHARED_RESOURCE_PROCESS_OUTPUT.ProcessIndex
member.summary: The index of the process in the list of processes.

member.name: D3D11_AUTHENTICATED_QUERY_RESTRICTED_SHARED_RESOURCE_PROCESS_OUTPUT.ProcessIdentifier
member.summary: A value that specifies the type of process.

member.name: D3D11_AUTHENTICATED_QUERY_RESTRICTED_SHARED_RESOURCE_PROCESS_OUTPUT.ProcessHandle
member.summary: A process handle. If the ProcessIdentifier member equals D3D11_PROCESSIDTYPE_HANDLE, the ProcessHandle member contains a valid handle to a process. Otherwise, this member is ignored.
